keyword: calories in a tablespoon of sugar
title: Calories in a Tablespoon of Sugar
meta_description: Discover calories in a tablespoon of sugar, plus full nutrition breakdown including carbs, sugars, and quick tweaks for alternatives.
h1: Calories in a Tablespoon of Sugar
assumptions: Granulated white sugar; 1 level tablespoon ≈12.5 g; no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by sugar type, granularity, packing density, and brand. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A tablespoon of granulated sugar contains about 48 calories, all from carbohydrates.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use powdered sugar (less dense, per tablespoon)

faqs.q: How many calories in a tablespoon of sugar?
faqs.a: Approximately 48 calories for one level tablespoon of granulated sugar.

faqs.q: Are all calories in sugar from carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, 100% from carbohydrates, specifically 12.5 g of sugars with no protein or fat.

faqs.q: Does brown sugar have more calories than white?
faqs.a: Slightly—about 50 kcal per tablespoon due to added molasses.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in a tablespoon?
faqs.a: Roughly 12.5 g, equivalent to about 3 teaspoons.

faqs.q: Is there fiber or sodium in table sugar?
faqs.a: No fiber and negligible sodium (0 mg) in pure granulated sugar.
